Step3.Error1: Password must be at least 8 characters

Step1.Info: You have decided to sign up with RyoGo.. Great choice!

Input.Title: Enter phone number
Input.Description: Provide your phone number to proceed

Step2.InfoYes: You already have an owner account with us:
Step2.InfoNo: You already have some accounts with us:

Input.Description: Confirm your phone number to proceed

Input.Title: Enter email address

Header.Title: Welcome!
Header.Description: Let's get you onboard in 4 easy steps.. and in less than 10 minutes

BodySteps.Title: Onboarding steps
BodySteps.Description: This is what we will be doing next:
BodySteps.Step1: 1. Create an account for your agency

BodyChecklist.Title: Onboarding checklist
BodyChecklist.Item2: Photo of the vehicle (where you can see number plate)
BodyChecklist.Item3: Document photos of vehicle RC, Insurance policy and PUC certificate

Field1.Title: Enter agency name
Field1.Error2: Name must be less than 30 characters

Field2.Title: Enter your name
Field2.Error2: Name must be less than 30 characters

Field3.Title: Enter your phone number
Field3.Description: Provide owner's phone number (to be used for login)

Field4.Title: Enter your email
Field4.Error2: Email must be less than 60 characters

Step1.APIError: An owner account with this phone and email already exists

Field2.Title: Enter agency email
Field2.Description: Business email to be used for communication
Field2.Error2: Email must be less than 60 characters

Field3.Title: Enter agency address
Field3.Placeholder: Address Line 1, Street, City, State, Pincode
Field3.Error2: Address must be less than 300 characters

Field4.Title: Owner photo (optional)
Field4.Error1: Image file size should be less than 1MB

Step2.APIError: Agency with this phone and email already exists

Field1.Title: Agency logo (optional)
Field1.Description: Upload a logo associated with your business
Field1.Error1: Image file size should be less than 1MB

Field2.Title: Commission rate (in %)
Field2.Description: The extra commission that will be added to every booking quote. (Don't worry, you can leave it blank and change it later. Default 15% will be set)
Field2.Error5: Rate must be a positive number

Field1.Title: Set password
Field1.Description: Set a new password for your account
Field1.Error1: Password must be at least 8 characters

Field2.Title: Confirm password
Field2.Error1: Password must be at least 8 characters

Confirm.Title: Confirm details to create your account:
Confirm.APIError: Account could not be created.. Please try again

Finish.Title: Congratulations!
Finish.Subtitle: Your account has been created successfully
Finish.Description1: Next, let's add a vehicle to your account.
Finish.Description2: (For now, we will add just 1 vehicle. You can add more later.)

Field1.Title: Enter vehicle number
Field1.Description: Provide registration number of the vehicle (without space or dash)
Field1.Error1: Vehicle number must be atleast 7 characters
Field1.Error2: Vehicle number must be less than 15 characters

Field3.Title: Vehicle brand
Field3.Error1: Brand name must be atleast 3 characters
Field3.Error2: Brand name must be less than 15 characters

Field4.Title: Vehicle color
Field4.Error1: Vehicle color must be atleast 3 characters
Field4.Error2: Vehicle color must be less than 15 characters

Field5.Title: Vehicle model
Field5.Error1: Vehicle model must be atleast 3 characters
Field5.Error2: Vehicle model must be less than 30 characters

Step1.APIError: Vehicle number is already added to this agency

Field1.Title: Enter passenger capacity
Field1.Description: How many passengers can travel in this vehicle (excluding driver)?
Field1.Error5: Capacity must be a positive number

Field2.Title: Enter odometer reading (Km)
Field2.Description: Check your odometer and enter the current reading
Field2.Error4: Odometer cannot be in decimals (round it up)
Field2.Error5: Odometer must be a positive number

Field3.Title: RC Photo
Field3.Description: Upload photo of vehicle registration certificate
Field3.Error2: File size should be less than 1MB
Field3.Error3: Only image and pdf files are allowed (.jpg, .jpeg, .png, .pdf )

Field4.Title: Vehicle photo
Field4.Description: Upload photos of the vehicle (atleast 1 photo with number plate visible)
Field4.Error2: File size should be less than 1MB
Field4.Error3: Only image and pdf files are allowed (.jpg, .jpeg, .png, .pdf )

Field1.Title: Insurance expiry date
Field1.Description: Provide vehicle insurance policy expiry date
Field1.Error1: Providing insurance expiry date is mandatory

Field2.Title: Insurance policy photo
Field2.Error2: File size should be less than 1MB
Field2.Error3: Only image and pdf files are allowed (.jpg, .jpeg, .png, .pdf )

Field3.Title: PUC expiry date
Field3.Error1: Providing PUC certifacte date is mandatory

Field4.Title: PUC certificate photo
Field4.Description: Upload Pollution Under Control Certificate photo
Field4.Error2: File size should be less than 1MB
Field4.Error3: Only image and pdf files are allowed (.jpg, .jpeg, .png, .pdf)

Field1.Title: Vehicle charge per Km (in Rs.)
Field1.Description: How much do you charge for the vehicle per Km? This will be used to calculate the booking quote for the customer. You can always change it later.
Field1.Error1: Vehicle Charge must be a number
Field1.Error3: Vehicle Charge must be less than 50Rs
Field1.Error4: Vehicle Charge cannot be in decimals
Field1.Error5: Vehicle Charge must be a positive number

Field3.Title: AC charge per day (in Rs.)
Field3.Description: Based on customer's AC preference, this per day charge will be added to the booking quote.
Field3.Error1: AC Charge must be a number
Field3.Error3: AC Charge must be less than 10000Rs
Field3.Error4: AC Charge cannot be in decimals
Field3.Error5: AC Charge must be a positive number

Confirm.Title: Confirm details to add your vehicle:
Confirm.APIError: Vehicle could not be added.. Please try again

Finish.Title: Congratulations!
Finish.Subtitle: Your vehicle has been added to the agency account
Finish.Description1: Next, let's add a driver to your account.
Finish.Description2: (For now, we will add just 1 driver. You can add more later.)

Field1.Title: Driver name
Field1.Error2: Name must be less than 30 characters

Field2.Title: Driver phone number
Field2.Description: Enter the driver's phone number (to be used for login). You can provide owner's phone number for now and change this later.

Field3.Title: Driver email
Field3.Description: Enter the driver's email address (login password will be sent here). You can enter owner's email for now and change this later.
Field3.Error2: Email must be less than 60 characters

Field4.Title: Driver photo (optional)
Field4.Error1: Image file size should be less than 1MB

Step1.APIError: Driver with this phone and email is already added to another agency.. try adding with a different phone or email

Field1.Title: Driver license number
Field1.Description: Provide license number of the driver (without space or dash)
Field1.Error1: License number must be atleast 12 characters
Field1.Error2: License number must be less than 20 characters

Field2.Title: License expiry date
Field2.Error1: Providing driver license expiry date is mandatory

Field3.Title: Driver License photo
Field3.Error2: File size should be less than 1MB
Field3.Error3: Only image and pdf files are allowed (.jpg, .jpeg, .png, .pdf )

Field1.Title: Driver address
Field1.Placeholder: Address Line 1, Street, City, State, Pincode
Field1.Error2: Address must be less than 300 characters

Field2.Title: Select all the vehicles that driver can drive
Field2.Error1: Providing atleast 1 vehicle type is mandatory

Field3.Title: Driver allowance per day (in Rs.)
Field3.Description: How much do you pay driver per day? This will be used to calculate the booking quote for the customer. You can always change it later.
Field3.Error1: Driver allowance must be a number
Field3.Error2: Driver allowance must be atleast 1 Rs.
Field3.Error3: Driver allowance must be less than 10000 Rs
Field3.Error4: Driver allowance cannot be in decimals
Field3.Error5: Driver allowance must be a positive number

Confirm.Title: Confirm details to add driver:
Confirm.APIError: Driver could not be added.. please try again
Confirm.Success: Driver added successfully.. Let's try to add a vehicle now!

Finish.Title: Congratulations!
Finish.Subtitle: Driver added to your account! You can add more later.
Finish.Email: Also, an email has been sent with the login and password details to {email}
Finish.Description1: Finally, we can also add an agent to your account. This step is optional
Finish.Description2: An agent runs your day-to-day operations like taking bookings from customers, assigning drivers, vehicles, etc.

Field1.Title: Agent name
Field1.Error2: Name must be less than 30 characters

Field2.Title: Agent phone number
Field2.Description: Enter the agent's phone number (to be used for login). Must be different from owner's phone number.

Field3.Title: Agent email
Field3.Description: Enter the agent's email address (login password will be sent here). You can enter owner's email for now and change this later.
Field3.Error2: Email must be less than 60 characters

Field4.Title: Agent photo (optional)
Field4.Error1: Image file size should be less than 1MB

Step1.APIError: Agent with this phone and email is already added to another agency.. try adding with a different phone or email

Confirm.Title: Confirm details to add agent:
Confirm.APIError: Agent could not be added.. try again later

Finish.Title: Congratulations!
Finish.Subtitle: Agent added to your account! You can add more later.
Finish.Email: Also, an email has been sent with the login details to {email}

ChangePasswordPage.Title: Welcome!
ChangePasswordPage.Subtitle: It seems like you are logging in for the first time! Please set a new password to secure your account.

Field1.Title: Current Password
Field1.Description: Enter the password that was sent in your email. You can check with the agency owner if you are not sure.
Field1.Error1: Password must be at least 8 characters

Field2.Title: New Password
Field2.Error1: Password must be at least 8 characters

Field3.Title: Confirm New Password
Field3.Error1: Password must be at least 8 characters

Step1.APIError: Password does not match.. please check your email again

Step1.Title: Create Account
Step1.Description: Create an owner account for you

Step2.Title: Add Vehicle
Step2.Description: Add a vehicle to your agency

Step3.Title: Add Driver
Step3.Description: Add a driver to your agency

Step4.Title: Add Agent
Step4.Description: Add an agent to run day-to-day operations (optional)
